scripts.local:all: npm run compile && start cmd /k "npm run node" && timeout 2 > NUL && npm run deploy:local && npm run sdk:local
scripts.zk:compile:docker: docker run --rm -v %cd%:/work -w /work ghcr.io/iden3/circom:latest circom circuits/nullifier.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym -l node_modules -o zkbuild/nullifier
scripts.zk:ptau: npx snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 zkbuild/ptau/pot12_0000.ptau -v && npx snarkjs powersoftau contribute zkbuild/ptau/pot12_0000.ptau zkbuild/ptau/pot12_0001.ptau --name="contrib1" -v && npx snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 zkbuild/ptau/pot12_0001.ptau zkbuild/ptau/pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.zk:setup: npx snarkjs groth16 setup zkbuild/nullifier/nullifier.r1cs zkbuild/ptau/pot12_final.ptau zkbuild/nullifier/nullifier_0000.zkey && npx snarkjs zkey contribute zkbuild/nullifier/nullifier_0000.zkey zkbuild/nullifier/nullifier_final.zkey --name="keycontrib1" -v
scripts.zk:exportv: npx snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier zkbuild/nullifier/nullifier_final.zkey contracts/VerifierGroth16.sol
scripts.zk:all: npm run zk:prep && npm run zk:compile && npm run zk:ptau && npm run zk:setup && npm run zk:exportv
